activities: Gaggle.Net, Inc. collects information from users of its websites (www.gaggle.net and www.authority3.com) and certain products and services.  Users may set up personal profiles, form relationships, send messages, perform searches and queries, and transmit information through various channels, depending on the category of user being registered, as permitted by the features authorized for use.  This data is used for various services to users according to the product or service involved, but often includes:  offering product support, providing various services, enabling sales and other transactions, conducting user conferences, conducting data analysis to improve products and services, and/or maintaining marketing relationships.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
